Text.Page:
Hello, friend. We've heard that your field work is impressive, but there's always room for improvement.

Head to the vaults, kill a {@linkcreature:124#102#Cyclops}, a {@linkcreature:125#103#Dracoloth}, or a {@linkcreature:126#104#Vulcan Render}, and bring back its heart as proof that you've completed the task.

Well done, friend!

I hope you found our vaults useful for honing your skills.
